message.content: This question requires an understanding of the process of evaporation. Option (A) is the correct answer because leaving two mason jars out with different levels of Gatorade will allow you to observe the different rates of evaporation. As the sun heats up the jars, the Gatorade will evaporate at different rates depending on the liquid level. Option (B) is unrelated to evaporation and more related to politics. Option (C) is impossible as humans cannot physically walk on the sun due to its extremely high temperatures. Option (D) is unrelated to evaporation and does not make sense in the context of the question.
